entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
